name: UFGHardDriveSettings
comment: Settings for which schematics are returned from research

methods.name: GetResearchRewardPackages
methods.comment:
Called to fill in an array of research schematics for storage and access from the MAM.
@note The research is assumed repeatable because of its inherent nature, thus the calledByResearch parameter is added back as a reward

methods.name: GetFallbackReturnItem
methods.comment: Get what we return back if we don't have any rewards to give for researching a hard drive

methods.name: GetHardDriveResearchSchematic
methods.comment: Get the schematic that is associated with hard drive research

methods.name: GetValidSchematicRewardDrops
methods.comment: Called by GetResearchRewardPackages to get only relevant schematics from the drop list

methods.name: GetFinalSchematicRewards
methods.comment: The list of schematics after the valid list is weighed by probability

properties.name: mUniqueItemCount
properties.comment:
This is the total quantity of unique elements Schematics that will be added to the reward package
@note This is the number of options the player can pick from

properties.name: mFallbackReturnItem
properties.comment: Fallback for returning hard drive if no research was available

properties.name: mHardDriveResearchSchematic
properties.comment: The schematic which is used to research hard drives
